name: Five Nights at Oriana's
description: Oriana's Family Diner is now open for business and family fun! The Klarkes had opened up a family diner with some animatronics for the kids. But they're in need of a security guard to watch the place from 12 AM to 6 AM. As you progress, you start to learn about Oriana's and why all the bad stuff is happening.
